title: World Athletics Awards 2025: World Athletics President: China creates stronger platform for World Athletics - CGTN
snippet: Speaking to CGTN, World Athletics President Sebastian Coe said China's well-developed athletics system is helping build a stronger platform for the global development of the sport of athletics.

title: Gold medalists, a multi-millionaire among 7 candidates for Olympic body presidency - India Today
snippet: World Athletics president Sebastian Coe, Prince Feisal al Hussein of Jordan, International Gymnastics Federation chief Monnan Watanbe and Johan Eliasch are among the candidates who will be in the race to replace Bach.
